## aads campaigns find

Find campaigns with selector

```
aads campaigns find [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --all                    Fetch all pages
      --field string           Filter field name
  -h, --help                   help for find
      --limit int              Max results (default 20)
      --offset int             Start offset
      --op string              Filter operator (EQUALS, CONTAINS, etc.)
      --selector-json string   Selector JSON (inline or @file)
      --values string          Comma-separated filter values
```
